title: 12 Cheese & Herb (Case of 6)
description: The Original $12.99 / PIZZA Mozzarella, Parmesan, and Asiago Cheese Fresh Herbs 100% Organically Grown Wheat The flatbread that started it all. A perfectly balanced blend of three cheeses and fresh herbs, this is our most popular recipe for a reason.
cleaned_text: 12 Cheese & Herb (Case of 6) [Shipping](/policies/shipping-policy)calculated at checkout. The Original - $12.99 / PIZZA - Mozzarella, Parmesan, and Asiago Cheese - Fresh Herbs - 100% Organically Grown Wheat The flatbread that started it all. A perfectly balanced blend of three cheeses and fresh herbs, this is our most popular recipe for a reason. Crust: 100% Organically Grown Wheat, Good Mountain Water, Organic Wheat Bran, Kosher Salt, Fresh Yeast. Toppings: Mozzarella Cheese (Whole Milk, Vegetable Rennet, Salt), Asiago Cheese (Whole Milk, Vegetable Rennet, Salt), Parmesan Cheese (Cultured Milk, Vegetable Rennet, Salt), Garlic Oil (Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Organic Canola Oil, Fresh Organic Garlic), Fresh Parsley, Herbs, Kosher Salt. Contains Wheat and Milk REMOVE FLATBREAD FROM PLASTIC WRAPPING. THAW FOR 15-30 MINUTES for the best pizza experience - it really makes a difference! It takes about the same amount of time to thaw as it takes for your oven to preheat. While the pizza thaws, preheat the oven to 425. Place directly on oven rack. Bake for 5-8 minutes. The crust should be lightly crisp to the touch, the cheese bubbly. The trick is not to overcook. It will make your flatbread dry. Remove from oven, slice, serve and ENJOY! NOT READY TO EAT. This product must be cooked to an internal temperature of 165F prior to eating. Refrigerate any unused heated portion. Tip: It's a good idea to place another pan or a piece of aluminum foil on the rack below the pizza (not directly on bottom of oven) to catch any drips while baking.
